data.name: Steampunk Gravity
data.detailed_description:
The story


London, 1871, we are in the middle of the Steampunk era of the Victorian era.
A mad genius wants to destroy the city from underground to show his power and impose his will on the whole of England.

To carry out his evil plan, he has scattered explosive charges throughout underground London, in strategic places, to be detonated soon.
Fortunately, we were able to find a few that our agents were able to defuse.

You Are Our Last Chance!
With your revolutionary turbine ship, you will descend into the depths of the city to retrieve our agents, as well as the explosive charges they have stored in containers.
Good luck!




Your ship is a flying submarine, powered by powerful revolutionary turbines, allowing you to propel yourself both in the air and in the water.
You'll need practice to handle it with dexterity!

You will have to recovery men and put them on the platforms that you will use to repair your ship.



You will also need to recovery heavy containers containing explosive charges and place them on the platforms.



Your ship can navigate underwater, but beware of the many devastating obstacles!

Evaluations / Awards

Evaluations / Awards
data.short_description: Steampunk Gravity is an action-simulation game where you pilot a ship, in the air and in the sea, with the objective of recovering very heavy explosive charges through confined spaces underground.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bits
  • Processor: Inter Core i7-4610M CPU 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
